languages.text: While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.
languages.original_text: При ношении {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}тяжелой брони{/g} персонаж с мира-кузни получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и +1 к {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражению{/g}. Также его нельзя {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}опрокинуть{/g}.

traits.locale_text: While wearing heavy armour, forge world characters gain +1 MP, +1 deflection, and cannot fall prone.

While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

languages.text: Während sie {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}schwere Rüstung{/g} tragen, erhalten Fabrikweltcharaktere +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} und können nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} werden.
languages.original_text: While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Während sie schwere {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} tragen, erhalten Fabrikweltcharaktere +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g} und können nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}hingestreckt{/g} werden.

languages.text: Lorsqu'ils portent une {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armure lourde{/g}, les personnages des mondes forges bénéficient de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}. Ils sont également invulnérables à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.
languages.original_text: While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'ils portent une {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armure lourde{/g}, les personnages des mondes forges bénéficient de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et +1 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}. Ils sont également invulnérables à l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Immobilisation{/g}.

languages.text: 当铸造世界的角色装备{g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}重型护甲{/g}时，会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，而且不会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: While wearing {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}heavy armour{/g}, forge world characters gain +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}, and cannot fall {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}prone{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 当铸造世界的角色装备重型{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}时，会获得+1{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与+1{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}，而且不会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}俯卧{/g}状态。

languages.text: Mientras llevan {g|Encyclopedia:HeavyArmour}armadura pesada{/g}, los personajes de mundos forja ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y no pueden ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras llevan {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} pesada, los personajes de mundos forja ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g}, +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} y no pueden ser {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribados{/g}.
